body: Schedule of Events           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Shiloh National Military Park NPS Birthday Bash - Concert in the Park      Time: 5:30 PM Location: Shiloh Battlefield Fees: FREE     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join us as we celebrate the Centennial of the NPS with a very special concert  View Details
